{{cpp/experimental/fs/directory_entry/title|replace_filename}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/directory_entry/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=fs_ts | 1=
void replace_filename( const path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Changes the filename of the directory entry.

Effectively sets path to {{c|path().parent_path() / p}}.

This function does not commit any changes to the filesystem.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | p | the path to append to the parent path of the currently stored path}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
